K12Dx_H0474:437a-0: @437a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12Dx_H0474:437a-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K12Dx_H0474:437a-2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla
K12Dx_H0474:437a-3: bee d'urya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo
K12Dx_H0474:437a-5: aom bhee sha dzye bhee sha dzye /
K12Dx_H0474:437a-6: mah'a bhee sha dznye bhee sha dzye /
